summary: This code is setting the "Autorun" value in the Microsoft Command Processor registry key to point to a startup script located at D:\project\jubilant-adventure\startup.cmd, which will run automatically upon system startup.

details.comment: This code is setting the "Autorun" value in the Microsoft Command Processor registry key to point to a startup script located at D:\project\jubilant-adventure\startup.cmd, which will run automatically upon system startup.
